original_title: Lies I Told My Little Sister
overview: After the death of her oldest sister, a 30 year old globe-trotting nature photographer is guilted onto a family trip to Cape Cod - along with the younger sister she used to torment. Amid recriminations, revelations, a very weird shopkeeper and an old romance, they square off against the patterns of childhood.
tagline: A family trip. Packing all the childhood baggage.
title: Lies I Told My Little Sister
